summary: This is an FBI 302 interview summary of a female victim, referred to as [REDACTED], who describes her relationship with Jeffrey Epstein beginning when she was approximately 15 years old. She details how she was recruited, the sexual nature of the massages, Epstein's preferences for underage girls, the role of his assistant Lesley Groff, and financial transactions including payment for an abortion. The interview was conducted in New York on November 4, 2020.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexual abuse. The interviewee describes meeting him as a teenager, providing sexual massages for money, and his manipulation and control over her.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Referred to as LESLEY, she worked in Epstein's office, facilitated communication and payments between Epstein and the interviewee, and arranged for items like money and lingerie to be picked up.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Attorney present during the FBI interview of the victim.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Attorney present during the FBI interview of the victim.

persons.name: Chris Tucker
persons.context: The interviewee recalls briefly meeting Chris Tucker at Epstein's house, with no significant interaction.

persons.name: Naomi Campbell
persons.context: Epstein told the interviewee he knew Naomi Campbell and could get her into Victoria's Secret. Epstein once introduced them in his office.

persons.name: Mike Tyson
persons.context: The interviewee recalls Epstein may have been talking to Mike Tyson on speaker phone, but does not remember details.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.context: The interviewee states Epstein was always on the phone with powerful people, including Bill Clinton.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: The interviewee states Epstein was always on the phone with powerful people, including Donald Trump.

persons.name: Dr. Kaplan
persons.context: Epstein would send the interviewee to his dentist, Dr. Kaplan, for medical care. She later received a bill from him.

connections.description: Groff worked as Epstein's assistant, managing his schedule, communications with girls, and handling financial disbursements like cash and tickets.
Epstein claimed to know Campbell and used this connection to promise modeling opportunities to the interviewee. He once introduced them.
The interviewee states Epstein was frequently on the phone with Bill Clinton, bragging about his connections to powerful people.
The interviewee states Epstein was frequently on the phone with Donald Trump, bragging about his connections to powerful people.
Groff was the primary point of contact for the victim to request money, tickets, and other items from Epstein. She facilitated the logistical and financial aspects of the abuse.

events.title: Victim begins relationship with Epstein
events.description: The victim, approximately 15 years old, begins meeting Jeffrey Epstein for massages that quickly become sexual, for which she is paid $300-$400.

events.title: Epstein bails victim out of jail
events.description: The victim and another girl (III) were arrested for underage drinking. She called Lesley Groff, and Epstein bailed them out. They later had to do community service.

events.title: Epstein's arrest in Florida and new rules
events.description: After Epstein was arrested in Florida, he returned to New York and instituted a rule that girls had to bring ID and be 18 years old, though this only lasted a few months.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim is interviewed by the FBI and Assistant U.S. Attorney, with her attorneys present, at 290 Broadway, New York, NY.

locations: 290 Broadway, New York, New York (FBI Office)
keyFacts: The victim was approximately 15 years old when she began a sexual relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, involving massages for which she was paid $300-$400.

Epstein's assistant, Lesley Groff, played a central role in facilitating the relationship, handling requests for money, hotel payments, abortion funding, and distributing gifts like Victoria's Secret lingerie.
Epstein explicitly preferred girls aged 15-18, on the 'slim side,' and shy or timid. He told the victim not to bring anyone over 18 and criticized her when she gained weight.
Epstein paid for the victim's abortion, providing $1000 through Lesley Groff after she called the office saying she needed $400 for the procedure.
The victim describes Epstein bragging about phone calls with powerful figures including a president (who traveled on his jet), Bill Clinton, and Donald Trump.
